# joy-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property           | Attribute  | Description                                                                                              | Type      | Default     |
| ------------------ | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `selected`         | `selected` | Selected status of the current tab                                                                       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `tab` _(required)_ | `tab`      | A tab id or name must be provided for each `joy-tab`. It's used internally to reference the selected tab | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Methods

### `setActive() => Promise<void>`

Set the active component for the tab

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
